response.overview: Ten years after they last saw each other at Juilliard, virtuoso pianist Alan Spencer and the alluring Liana Buckman meet by accident, and the sparks fly. Love once denied becomes love fulfilled - but as they soon learn, passion comes at a price. Running from Liana's husband and Alan's tortured past, they flee to a beautiful beach house, where their love blossoms -- but before long, they're caught up in a desperate struggle for survival.
response.title: Passionata
